page.title: 06Village Activities
page.content: In the village of Dunston there is a bowling club.They play bowls on Wednesdays.In winter they play indoor bowling.The club have matches against other local clubs. There is also a ballet club in the village.Quite a few people from school go to ballet.The teacher is called Janet Ashton. In Dunston Village Hall there is a social club which is a place where teenagers can go and have drinks like coke and other things. There is a pool table.People have to be 13 or over to go. In Nocton there is a youth club.It is for all ages.they play games like pool,table tennis and darts. The youth club starts at 6.30 and it finishes at 9.00.People buy things like drinks and crisps.It is held on Thursdays.
